examples.text: There was vape juice just sitting on the table at my

relations.target: juice: the liquid part that can be extracted from plant or animal tissue by squeezing or cooking <i78937>
vapor: a visible suspension in the air of particles of some substance <i116294>
nicotine: an alkaloid poison that occurs in tobacco; used in medicine and as an insecticide <i114322>
liquid: a substance that is liquid at room temperature and pressure <i115634>

senses.definition: liquid for use in electronic cigarettes
